	çº¿æ€§è¡¨æ˜¯å…·æœ‰ç›¸åŒç±»å‹çš„n(n>=0)ä¸ªæ•°æ®å…ƒç´ çš„æœ‰é™åºåˆ—

æ€§è´¨ï¼š

çº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„æ“ä½œå¯¹åº”äºæˆ‘ä»¬ç¨‹åºä¸­çš„ä¸€ç»„å‡½æ•°

List *List_Create(void);
void List_Destroy(List *list);
void List_Clear(List *list);
int List_Insert(List *list, ListNode *node, int pos)
ListNode * List_Delete(List *list, int pos)
ListNode * List_Get(List *list, int pos)
int List_Length(List *list)

çº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„é¡ºåºå­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„

çº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„é¡ºåºå­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„æ˜¯æŒ‡ç”¨ä¸€æ®µåœ°å€è¿ç»­çš„å­˜å‚¨å•å…ƒä¾æ¬¡å­˜å‚¨çº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„æ•°æ®å…ƒç´  çœ‹æˆCè¯­è¨€çš„æ•°ç»„ï¼Œç”¨Cè¯­è¨€çš„ä¸€ç»´æ•°ç»„å®ç°é¡ºåºå­˜å‚¨ç»“æ„

	#define MAXSIZE 20 //çº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„æœ€å¤§å®¹é‡
	typedef struct _list {
		char node[MAXSIE]; //å­˜å‚¨ç©ºé—´çš„èµ·å§‹åœ°å€æ˜¯node
		int length; //è¡¨ç¤ºçº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„å½“å‰é•¿åº¦
	}List;

è·å¾—å…ƒç´ çš„æ“ä½œ

	char Get(List *list, int pos) {
		char ret = -1;
		
		// 1. åˆ¤æ–­listçš„åˆæ³•æ€§
		// 2. åˆ¤æ–­ä½ç½®çš„åˆæ³•æ€§
		if ( (list!=NULL) &&(0<=pos) && (pos<list->length) )
			// 3. è·å¾—å…ƒç´ 	
			ret = list->node[pos];
		return ret;
	}

æ’å…¥å…ƒç´ çš„æ“ä½œ

ç®—æ³•ï¼š
	1.åˆ¤æ–­çº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„åˆæ³•æ€§	
	2.åˆ¤æ–­æ’å…¥ä½ç½®çš„åˆæ³•æ€§
	3.æŠŠæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ åˆ°æ’å…¥ä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´ ä¾æ¬¡åç§»ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®
	4.å°†æ–°å…ƒç´ æ’å…¥
	5.å°†é•¿åº¦åŠ 1

int Insert(List *list, char c, int pos) {
		int ret = (list!=NULL);
		int i = 0;
		
		ret = ret && (list->length <= MAXSIZE);
		ret = ret && (0<=pos);	

		if ( ret ) {
			if ( pos > list->length)
				pos = list->length;
			
			for (i=list->length; i>pos; i--)
				list->node[i] = list->node[i-1]; 
			
			list->node[i] = c;
			list->length++;
		}

		return ret;
	}

åˆ é™¤å…ƒç´ æ“ä½œ

ç®—æ³•ï¼š
	1.åˆ¤æ–­çº¿æ€§è¡¨çš„åˆæ³•æ€§	
	2.åˆ¤æ–­åˆ é™¤ä½ç½®çš„åˆæ³•æ€§
	3.å°†å…ƒç´ å–å‡º
	4.å°†åˆ é™¤ä½ç½®ä¹‹åçš„æ‰€æœ‰å…ƒç´ éƒ½å‘å‰ç§»åŠ¨ä¸€ä¸ªä½ç½®
	5.é¡ºåºè¡¨çš„é•¿åº¦-1

har Delete(List *list, int pos) {
			char ret = -1;
			int i = 0;
			
			if ( (list!=NULL)&&(0<=pos)&&(pos<list->length) ){
				ret = list->node[pos];
				for (i=pos+1; i<list->length; i++)
					list->node[i-1] = list->node[i];
				list->length--;
			}
		
			return ret;
		}

ä¼˜ç‚¹ï¼šå¯ä»¥å¿«é€Ÿçš„è·å–è¡¨ä¸­åˆæ³•ä½ç½®çš„å…ƒç´  ç¼ºç‚¹ï¼šæ’å…¥å’Œåˆ é™¤çš„æ—¶å€™éœ€è¦ç§»åŠ¨å¤§é‡çš„å…ƒç´

item.title: å‰‘æ³•ç¯‡
item.description:
â—€ è¿”å›

é—®é¢˜æè¿°

å­—ç¬¦ä¸²è¢«æ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºacssiç , æ•°å€¼è¢«hexåŠ å‡

è½¬æ¢æ€è·¯

å­—ç¬¦: acssi è½¬ string æ•°å€¼: è®¡ç®—å‡ºå€¼

è´´ä»£ç 

#include <unistd.h>
#include <fcntl.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <errno.h>
#define setnull(x) memset(&(x), 0, sizeof(x))
#define CAL(x, y, z) x + y - z
#define ERR_EXIT(m) \
 do { \
 fprintf(stderr, "[%s][%d]:%s %s \n" ,__FILE__, __LINE__, m, strerror(errno));\
 exit(EXIT_FAILURE); \
 }while(0)


int main( int argc, char **argv){
 int i,j,len,varLen,ilen ;
 char buf[1024];
 char temp[2];
 char var[64],var1[64];
 char ascii[2];
 char hexBuf[1024];
 char fbuf[1024];
 char tobuf[1024];
 int begin = 0, end = 0; 
 char *data;
 char *pstr;
 char *pstr1;
 int retlen;
 char varBuf[20];
 char varRet;
 char srcfile[256],destfile[256];

 setnull(srcfile);
 setnull(destfile);
 sprintf(srcfile,"%s", argv[1]);
 sprintf(destfile,"%s", argv[2]);
 //printf("%s\n",argv[1]);
 //printf("%s\n",srcfile);
 //printf("%s\n",argv[2]);
 //printf("%s\n",destfile);
 //strcpy(hexBuf, argv[1]);
 FILE* fd = fopen(srcfile,"r");
 FILE* fdw = fopen(destfile,"w");
 if(fd){
 while(!feof(fd)){
 memset(fbuf, 0x00, sizeof(fbuf));
 data = fgets(fbuf,sizeof(fbuf)-1,fd);
 if(data){
 memset(tobuf, 0x00, sizeof(tobuf));
 len = strlen(data);
 for (i = 0, j = 0; i < len;){
 if(!memcmp(data + i,"\\x",2)){
 memset(ascii, 0x00, 2);
 memcpy(temp, data + i + 2, 2);
 //printf("temp: %s\n", temp);
 hex2ascii(temp, ascii);
 //printf("ascii: %s\n", ascii);
 memcpy(tobuf + j, ascii, 1);
 i += 4;
 j++;
 //printf("find \\x string offset %d\n", i); 

 }else if(!memcmp(data + i,"(0x",3)){
 memset(var, 0x00, sizeof(var));
 memset(var1, 0x00, sizeof(var1));
 memset(varBuf, 0x00, sizeof(varBuf));

 memcpy(var, data + i, sizeof(var)); 
 //printf("var: %s \n", var);

 pstr = strchr(var, '(');
 if ( pstr != NULL)
 {
 if( pstr1 = strstr(var, ")")){
 //printf("find ),\n");
 varLen = pstr1 - pstr ;
 //printf("%d\n", varLen);
 memcpy(var1, var+1,varLen -1);
 varRet = cal(var1);
 sprintf(varBuf,"%d",varRet);
 //printf("%s,%d\n",varBuf,varRet);
 ilen = strlen(varBuf);
 memcpy(tobuf + j, varBuf , ilen);
 j += ilen ;
 i += varLen + 1;
 }
 //else if( pstr1 = strstr(var, ");")){
 // printf("find );\n");
 // int varLen = pstr1 - pstr ;
 // printf("%d\n", varLen);
 // memcpy(var1, var+1,varLen -1);
 // varRet = cal(var1);
 // sprintf(varBuf,"%d;",varRet);
 // printf("%s,%d\n",varBuf,varRet);
 // int ilen = strlen(varBuf);
 // memcpy(tobuf + j, varBuf , ilen + 1);
 // j += ilen + 1;
 // i += varLen + 1 + 1;
 // }
 //else if( pstr1 = strstr(var, ")")){
 // printf("find )\n");
 // int varLen = pstr1 - pstr ;
 // printf("%d\n", varLen);
 // memcpy(var1, var+1,varLen -1);
 // varRet = cal(var1);
 // sprintf(varBuf,"%d",varRet);
 // printf("%s,%d\n",varBuf,varRet);
 // int ilen = strlen(varBuf);
 // memcpy(tobuf + j, varBuf , ilen );
 // j += ilen;
 // i += varLen + 1;
 //// }
 }
 }else{

 tobuf[j] = data[i];
 i++;
 j++;
 }

 }
 //printf("%s", data);
 fprintf(fdw,"%s",tobuf);
 }
 }
 }else{
 ERR_EXIT("open file failure");
 }
 fclose(fd);
 //for( i = 0; i < strlen(argv[1]); i++){ 
 // printf("%c\n", argv[i]);
 //}
 //int ret = hex2ascii(hexBuf,buf);
 //for( i = 0; i < strlen(buf); i++){ 
 // printf("%c", buf[i]);
 //}
 //printf("\n");
}

int hex2ascii(char *hex, char *ascii)
{
 int len = strlen(hex), tlen, cnt , i;

 for( i = 0, cnt = 0 ,tlen =0; i < len; i++){
 char c = toupper(hex[i]);

 if(( c >= '0' && c <='9') || ( c >= 'A' && c <= 'F'))
 {
 int t = ( c >='A') ? c - 'A' + 10 : c - '0';

 if(cnt)
 ascii[tlen++] += t, cnt =0;
 else 
 ascii[tlen] = t << 4, cnt = 1;
 
 }
 }
 return tlen;
}
int cal(char *exprs){

 int x,y,z;
 //printf("%s\n", exprs);
 sscanf(exprs,"%x + %d - %x",&x,&y,&z);
 return CAL(x,y,z); 
}

ç¼–è¯‘

gcc -o hex2ascii hex2ascii.c

item.title: å‰‘æ³•ç¯‡
item.description:
â—€ è¿”å›

å•ä¸€èŒè´£åŸåˆ™(SRP:Single Responsibility Principle)

ä¸€ä¸ªç±»åªè´Ÿè´£å®Œæˆä¸€ä¸ªèŒè´£æˆ–è€…åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¸è¦å­˜åœ¨å¤šäºä¸€ç§å¯¼è‡´ç±»å˜æ›´çš„åŸå› ã€‚å•ä¸€èŒè´£åŸåˆ™é€šè¿‡é¿å…è®¾è®¡å¤§è€Œå…¨çš„ç±»ï¼Œé¿å…å°†ä¸ç›¸å…³çš„åŠŸèƒ½è€¦åˆåœ¨ä¸€èµ·ï¼Œæ¥æé«˜ç±»çš„å†…èšæ€§ã€‚åŒæ—¶ï¼Œç±»èŒè´£å•ä¸€ï¼Œç±»ä¾èµ–çš„å’Œè¢«ä¾èµ–çš„å…¶ä»–ç±»ä¹Ÿä¼šå˜å°‘ï¼Œå‡å°‘äº†ä»£ç çš„è€¦åˆæ€§ï¼Œä»¥æ­¤æ¥å®ç°ä»£ç çš„é«˜å†…èšã€æ¾è€¦åˆã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ‹†åˆ†å¾—è¿‡ç»†ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šä¼šé€‚å¾—å…¶åï¼Œåå€’ä¼šé™ä½å†…èšæ€§ï¼Œä¹Ÿä¼šå½±å“ä»£ç çš„å¯ç»´æŠ¤æ€§ã€‚

å¼€æ”¾-å…³é—­åŸåˆ™(OCP:Open Closed Principle)

 decimal taxableIncome = income - deduction;

 break;
 case "USA":

 break;
 case "UK":
 //Todocalculation
 break;
 }
 return taxAmount;
 }
}
